title: Awesome product!! Loving it!!
body: mCaffeine Naked & Raw Coffee Body Lotion is perfect for daily moisturization and will perk up  mood with the great aroma of Coffee.It is extremely hydrating, pleasing and soothing to body. It is good for dry skin as well as oily skin. It provides good moisture to the skin and leaves your skin glowing. Love the fragrance though. It also includes Vitamin C as one of the ingredients which  is a natural sun-protector and improves the overall health of the skin. It also has Shea Butter & Cocoa Butter which nourishes the skin.Best part of the product is it is paraben free hence used for sensitive skin too. Highly recommended. must try.
